Ellipt2d: Online documentation.

Ellipt2d no longer comes with its own documentation. Since Python 2.1, the documentation of each module can instead be accessed using pydoc, a shell command that can be applied to a Python file (e.g. pydoc tkplot). I tend to use "pydoc -g" which starts a GUI with a search engine.
